overview: Lakshman Prabu has over 15 years experience in the credit union industry, including managing programming groups and overseeing more than 30 software engineers. He was the Chief Architect for a leading credit union core data processing vendor’s software products and was in charge of all aspects of development and implementation from identifying cost-effective and efficient technological solutions and training and managing programmers to educating customers about the end product. Prabu’s wide-ranging technology and project management background, customer service orientation, expertise in the financial services industry, and leadership skill position him to guide CUBUS Solutions’ team of software engineers through all phases of the Software Development Life Cycle.
